items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: You never know what’s gonna show up when you order a dress that barely has any reviews, but this dress is beautiful! It’s high quality and super flattering!! Read more
items.author: Faith Rawls

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small, but nice quality dress
items.body: Beautiful dress but runs small. Not intended for women with larger breasts. Still, nice quality. XL fits like a 10 instead of a 12/14. Read more
items.author: Cristina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Definitely an evening or night time dress. I ordered the black and it is stunning. Read more
items.author: Amber Lollie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, elegant dress, small sizing
items.body: This is a very pretty and well-made dress that is perfect for an event or wedding. I got the black as I tend to go to awards events and similar outings rather than weddings, Unfortunately, size large is not very large. I currently wear a size 12 in pants and a large in tops, and this dress was hilariously small on me. I would guess that size large will fit a woman who wears a size 8 comfortably. Maybe a size 10 at the most. I didn't take pictures with the dress on because it was not something that anyone would want to see. I am currently losing weight, so I hope that I will be able to fit into this beauty at some point. When I was trying it on, my husband came in and commented that he loved the dress, but was it supposed to be open like that on the side? It wasn't; it was the zipper that I could not zip up. Still, it's very pretty, so for ladies who are thinner than I am, this dress is a great option for an elegant and beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: S Sargent

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!!!
items.body: This dress is just gorgeous, and so well made! I can't believe it's only $40. I've paid FAR more for dresses of lower quality. I would say it runs just a tiny bit small, only because the fabric has no give or stretch at all. I am currently carrying some extra pounds and it doesn't quite fit right, but at my normal (and ideal) weight I know it's going to look great. I'm not going to ding the dress for my own weight gain, lol. The fabric is not too thick, but it's also substantial (NOT super thin like a slip dress or nightgown). There's a zipper on the side. The stitching is very nice and there were no stray threads anywhere. It arrived with plenty of wrinkles but it'll be easy to steam or iron on low. I now have some extra motivation to shed the extra pounds, because I want to wear this dress at the holidays! It would be a perfect understated piece that I could dress up a bit. The dress would also be appropriate at a wedding, at church, or even at a business cocktail-type event (it's fitted, but definitely suitable for wearing around business colleagues). I'm really impressed by the style, quality, and presentation of this dress. A great Amazon find! Read more
items.author: Ms. M

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Pink, Blue, Purple, Apricot, Black, Grey Green, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
